snippet: As the Supreme Court heard arguments in a case challenging race-conscious admission to public colleges, university officials watched for clues to where the court might go.
abstract: University officials across the country watch for clues as the Supreme Court hears arguments in a case challenging race-conscious admission to public colleges.
lead_paragraph: As the Supreme Court heard arguments in a case challenging race-conscious admission to public colleges, university officials watched for clues to where the court might go.

headline.seo: Colleges Brace for Court Decision on Affirmative Action
headline.main: Schools Brace for Decision on Affirmative Action
headline.print_headline: Colleges Look to Supreme Court for Clues
